name: Dodge Till Infinity
description:
Game by LADev

Get into a 2D world where you have to avoid and DODGE BLOCKS TILL YOU REACH INFINITY.Basically it is a game where you have to use the right and left side of the screen to move left or right to dodge obstacles and NOT DIE! Joystick is not supported.The main motive of the game is to have fun.

Controls : 
Move Left - A/Left Arrow Key
Move Right - D/Right Arrow Key 
Pause Game - Esc
